name: DESCENT (sora)
description:
DESCENT is a movement based shooter inspired by early source bunny-hopping found in games like QUAKE and Counter-Strike. You play as the champion of a god, tasked with traversing through many dimensions to find artefacts in order to save your home.

The demo includes the intro level and the first level of the game as they are currently.

Everything you see is subject to change and does not represent the final product.

Controls:

WASD to move, A and D in the air to strafe and gain speed.

Space to jump, holding space automatically jumps.

Mouse to look, shoot, and use abilities.
